description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference 11891/APP/2018/3414, dated 17.06.2019, for the 'Redevelopment to provide 87 residential units in two blocks, together with associated access, car and cycle parking; communal and private amenity space; and landscaping.' Amendment seeking to replace the rear-facing window and panel at Plot 15 with a bi-fold door.
decision_conditions: Condition 2 of planning permission reference 11891/APP/2018/3414, dated 17.06.2019, is amended to:
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
and amended s96A drawings regarding ground floor apartment 'plot 15':
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two Saved UDP Policies (November 2012) and the London Plan (March 2016).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Conditions 2, which is superseded by the above conditions, all other conditions relating to planning permission reference 11891/APP/2018/3414, dated 17.06.2019, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
This non-material amendment decision notice should be read in conjunction with previously approved non-material amendment decision notice (application reference 11891/APP/2019/2151).
